title: Perfect Test Preparation
detail_text: <:th_ch0009/>Rin, how is it going over there?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>It’s going perfect nya. How about you, Nico-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>You’re asking this Nico-nii that? There’s no way it’s going less than perfect for me<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Ehehe~, with this we’ll get perfect test scores nya. I can see everyone’s surprised face nya!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>That’s right, this time we won’t let anyone complain. With that said, we really did our best right<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>To get 100 on the test, we wrote 100 shrine plaques, we made 100 teru teru bouzu, we even kept drawing the fortune strip until we got a great blessing!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>We’ve done so much that I can already see the results<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Hey hey, if we get full marks, who should we show it to first?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Everyone of course! Let’s gather everyone and brag to them<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>That’s a great idea nyaa! I can’t wait nya!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
